{ui:{smithable:1b,upgrade:[[{count:1,Slot:12b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/netherite","custom_model_data":1019,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"#F65A5A","text":"ネザライト"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"漆黒に燦めく未知の鉱石。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"冷たい光沢に神秘を感じる。"}]']}},{count:9,Slot:13b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/gold_shards","custom_model_data":1006,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"white","text":"金の欠片"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"錬精された金の小さな欠片。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"見た目も美しく使いやすい。"}]']}},{count:3,Slot:14b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/crystal_shards","custom_model_data":1009,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"white","text":"クリスタルの欠片"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"小さなクリスタルの欠片。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"氷のような透明感を持つ。"}]']}}],[{count:2,Slot:12b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/netherite","custom_model_data":1019,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"#F65A5A","text":"ネザライト"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"漆黒に燦めく未知の鉱石。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"冷たい光沢に神秘を感じる。"}]']}},{count:5,Slot:13b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/gold","custom_model_data":1007,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"#6FE58D","text":"金"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"希少なわけではないが特別"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"価値が高いとされている。"}]']}},{count:4,Slot:14b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/crystal","custom_model_data":1010,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"#6FE58D","text":"クリスタル"}',"lore
